These are some of the things that you can see in Quthing: 
The largest bushmen paintings in Southern Africa.
The fortress of Moorosi the king of Baphuthi (Mt Moorosi).
Dinosaur footprints.
Letsie Lake.
Bearded vulture (an endangered large bird).
Sebapala River.
Quthing River.
Qomoqomong River.
Home of the former Prime Minister of Lesotho (Chief Sekhonyana Maseribane).
Seaka bridge (built during colonial period by the British).
Seforong.
Senqu River.
